lead_paragraph: ABRAMSON--Richard. The Board of Governers and the Members of The Seawane Club, record with sorrow the loss of our member Richard Abramson. We extend heartfelt sympathy to his wife Lorraine and family. Jeffrey Greenfield, President 1/3
